description: Live text commentary of the Irish Cup Fifth Round and BetMcLean semi-finals, plus in-play clips from Larne vs Cliftonville, Glentoran vs Crusaders, Glenavon vs Dundela and Institute vs Loughgall.
title: Irish Cup fifth round and BetMcLean Cup semi-finals
title_page: Irish Cup fifth round and BetMcLean Cup semi-finals - updates - BBC Sport
maintext:
Over and out
That's it from us after a dramatic night of cup football.
Glentoran and Cliftonville will contest the BetMcLean Cup final in March after their dramatic semi-final victories over Crusaders and Larne.
Meanwhile Glenavon, Loughgall, Moyola Park and Dollingstown advance to the sixth round of the Irish Cup.
That's it from us tonight, but we;ll be back for a bumper weekend of Irish Premiership action, beginning with the livestreamed match between Dungannon Swifts and Glenavon from Stangmore Park which will be broadcast on BBC iPlayer and the BBC Sport website and app on Friday night.
Be sure to join us then, but for now it's goodbye and good night.
